caption: Access Activity
description: Access activity events describe successful/failed attempts to access an application.
name: access_activity

1.caption: Access Grant
1.description: The incoming request has permission to the application resource.

2.caption: Access Deny
2.description: The incoming request does not have permission to the application resource.

3.caption: Access Revoke
3.description: The incoming request's access has been revoked due to security policy enforcements/changes. (i.e. security state of device changes)

4.caption: Access Error
4.description: An error occurred during processing the request.

proxy.description: Details about the proxy if available.

src_endpoint.description: Details about the source endpoint of the connection.
